UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: 'Lollipop'-shaped helical structure of a hybrid antimicrobial peptide of temporin B-lipopolysaccharide binding motif and mapping cationic residues in antibacterial activity
Literature.Author: Mohanram H, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µM)
